resources.string:
Mathematics
 "1. Higher Engineering Mathematics" by B.S. Grewal
 "2. Advanced Engineering Mathematics" by Erwin Kreyszig

 Programming
 "1. The C Programming Language" by Brian W. Kernighan and Dennis M. Ritchie
 "2. Let Us C" by Yashavant Kanetkar

 Physics
 "1. Engineering Physics" by R.K. Gaur and S.L. Gupta
 "2. Concepts of Modern Physics" by Arthur Beiser

 Chemistry
 "1. Engineering Chemistry" by Jain and Jain
 "2. A Textbook of Engineering Chemistry" by Shashi Chawla

 Electrical and Electronics Engineering
 "1. Basic Electrical Engineering" by D.P. Kothari and I.J. Nagrath
 "2. Principles of Electronics" by V.K. Mehta and Rohit Mehta
